document.description: Large Party tray $53.99. Soft Drinks / Tea $1.65 - $1.95 ... This place is good but not near 5 stars. I like the prices and menu, but find that the sandwiches are a little dry ...
document.body:
Delaware Sub Shop 1104 W 34th St , Austin TX 78705 (512) 458-8423 Cuisines and Dishes at Delaware Sub Shop: Sandwiches Wraps American
Menu for Delaware Sub Shop
Cold Subs
make any sub a salad $1.00, all cold subs include lettuce, onions, tomatoes, pickles, sweet or hot peppers, oil and spices
Delaware Classic $3.95 - $6.55 genoa salami, Provolone and ham Italian $5.25 - $8.25 genoa salami, Provolone, capicolla ham and ham Italian Gourmet $5.85 - $9.65 genoa salami, Provolone, capicolla ham prosciuttini ham and ham Capicolla $4.55 - $7.75 capicolla ham and Provolone Delaware Deluxe $5.70 - $10.95 honey smoked turkey breast, ham, bacon and Provolone` Peppered Turkey Breast $4.95 - $8.45 sliced turkey and Provolone Dell-Sliced Turkey Brest $4.95 - $8.45 sliced turkey and Provolone Honey Smoked Turkey Breast $4.95 - $8.45 sliced turkey and Provolone Roast Beef $4.95 - $8.50 sliced roast beef and Provolone Salami $3.95 - $6.55 sliced genoa salami and Provolone Ham $3.95 - $6.25 ham and Provolone Tuna $3.95 - $6.25 tuna and Provolone Cheese $4.35 - $7.50 Provolone and white American cheese, add bacon to any sub (per slice) $0.30, add mushrooms to any sub $0.40, $0.60
Hot Subs
Philly Cheesesteak $5.25 - $8.45 grilled sliced ribeye steak white American cheese, sauteed mushrooms and onions, sweet or hot peppers and ketchup Grilled Chicken Cheesesteak $5.25 - $8.45 grilled chicken breast white American cheese, sauteed mushrooms, and onions, sweet or hot peppers and oregano Eggplant parmesan $4.95 - $8.25 eggplant, sauteed mushrooms and onions, American, Provolone and parmesan cheeses, marinara sauce, sweet or hot peppers and oregano Chicken Parmesan $5.95 - $11.95 breaded chicken breast, sauteed mushrooms and onions, American, Provolone and parmesan cheese, marinara sauce, sweet or hot peppers and oregano Grilled Vegetarian $4.35 - $7.50 sauteed mushrooms and onions, American and Provolone cheese, marinara sauce, sweet or hot peppers and oregano meatball $4.35 - $7.90 Italian meatballs, Provolone, onions, sweet or hot peppers and oregano Italian Sausage (Fridays Only) $3.95 - $7.90 grilled Italian sausage, Provolone, onions, sweet or hot peppers and oregano Lettuce and Tomato on All of the Above $0.25 - $0.50
Sandwiches
daily Special $3.95 sandwich of the day Daily Deal $5.50 sandwich of the day, chips and a 20 oz. drink Daily Deal $5.95 sandwich of the day, chips and a 32 oz. drink Kid's Meal $3.99 1/4 turkey, ham, meatball or cheese sandwich, chips, one cookie and 20 oz. drink (32 oz, not available) Small Party Tray $27.99
Large Party tray $53.99
Soft Drinks / Tea $1.65 - $1.95
Tasty Kakes $1.50
Chips $0.99
Soup (Nov.-Feb.) $2.20
Chef Salad $3.95 extra salad dressing $0.35, extra meat slice $0.50, extra cheese slice $0.30
